record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JUNE 4, 2007, AT 2:30 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, if there is no further business today, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the provisions of H. Con. Res. 158, recognizing that there will be no rollcall votes on the first day we get back, Monday, June 4, 2007.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 1:28 p.m, adjourned until Monday, June 4, 2007, at 2:30 p.m.
